name: Generate accessibility report across our website

elements.name: As a user I expect to be able to create a new contact

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "create" button
I am directed to the "create contact" page
the "create contact header" should contain the text "Create Contact"
I fill in the "name" input with "Terry Barks"
I select the "Male" option from the "gender"
I fill in the "phone" input with "555-555-5555"
I fill in the "street" input with "123 Main St"
I fill in the "city" input with "New York"
I click the "save" button
I am directed to the "home" page
I fill in the "search" input with "Terry Barks"
the "search" should not equal the text "Terry Bark"
the "contact" should be displayed
the "full name label" should contain the text "Name:"
the "name" should equal the text "Terry Barks"
the "gender label" should contain the text "Gender:"
the "gender" should equal the text "Male"
the "address label" should contain the text "Address:"
the "address" should equal the text "123 Main St, New York"
the "edit" should be displayed
the "delete" should be displayed

elements.name: As a user I do not expect a saved contact to persirst after a page refresh

I fill in the "phone" input with "555-555-5555"
I fill in the "street" input with "70 810"
I fill in the "city" input with "Buenos Aires"
I click the "save" button
I am directed to the "home" page
I fill in the "search" input with "Mery Duharty"
the "contact" should be displayed
I refresh the "home" page
I fill in the "search" input with "Mery Duharty"
the "contact" should not be displayed
